name: electron-direct-ipc-test-app
description: Minimal Electron app for testing electron-direct-ipc.

scripts.build: tsc && cp src/index.html dist/ && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); let c=fs.readFileSync('dist/renderer.js','utf8'); c=c.replace(/^\"use strict\";\nObject\.defineProperty\(exports, \"__esModule\", \{ value: true \}\);\n/,''); fs.writeFileSync('dist/renderer.js',c);"
